data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.
You have 90+ degrees to go to the starting point. If you do this correctly, you'll return to your starting point. So, the answer is Yes.

Turn around means the direction in which you are going. Turning right is a direction in which you are looking away from. So, the answer is Yes.
